item.description:
Learn the basics of the 9 Enneagram personality types with Herb Pearce, a leading expert of the Enneagram who has taught 2000 workshops on this very revealing personality system. He acts out the 9 types with hats, describing each in depth, with ways to grow and develop unique to each type. Herb helps you find your core type, gives great pointers on how to relate effectively with each type and what makes each type tick! Many thousands of people have benefited from this information, awareness and down-to-earth action based communication skills.

Guaranteed to be fun, insightful and instantly and practically useful. I promise it will have a positive affect in all of your relationships! The normal cost for this evening is $40 and it's only $10 this one time only to attract as many people as possible. Bring friends!

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, uses the Enneagram and Myers-Briggs in his counselling practice for individuals, couples and families and has taught the Enneagram in public workshops and for hundreds of organizations for over 23 years. He is the author of Enneagram Basics, Enneagram Beyond the Basics and Herb's Tips for Living. http://www.herbpearce.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram Basics: Improve Your Relationships
